gil.core
Class IntegrationExecutive

java.lang.Object
  gil.core.IntegrationExecutive

public class IntegrationExecutive
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the data and command interchange between the process model and an external system.

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

IntegrationExecutive

public IntegrationExecutive(IProcessModelAdapter pm,
                            IExternalSystemAdapter es,
                            ITransferPipeline pipe,
                            SignalMetadata[] smd,
                            GILConfiguration config)
Initializes this object with the three parts forming an integration solution. The external system adapter to be the front end facing an arbitrary external system. The process model adapter to be the front end to the process model. The transfer pipeline used to transform and monitor data flowing between the external system and the process model.

Method Detail

start

public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
Starts the data supervision and data transfer between the process models and the external system. If allready started this method does nothing.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

stop

public void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

invokePipelineStageCommand

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> invokePipelineStageCommand(int stageSeqNo,
                                                                                   java.lang.String commandID,
                                                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
                                                                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                                   java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
Invokes the control command with the given command ID on the requested stage. This method blocks until the command is completed.

Parameters:
stageSeqNo - The order no. of the stage in the transfer pipeline that uniquely identifies it.
commandID - The unique (within one stage class) identifier for the command to be invoked.
parameters - The map of parameters where the key identifies the parameter.
Returns:
A map of result values from the invokation.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the invokation is interrupted for some reason.
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thrown if an exception is thrown by the underlying pipeline stage during the execution of the command.

invokeExternalSystemCommand

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> invokeExternalSystemCommand(java.lang.String commandID,
                                                                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
                                                                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
Invokes the control command with the given command ID on external system. This method blocks until the command is completed.

Parameters:
commandID - The unique identifier for the command to be invoked.
parameters - The map of parameters where the key identifies the parameter.
Returns:
A map of result values from the invokation.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the invokation is interrupted for some reason.
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thrown if an exception is thrown by the underlying adapter during the execution of the command.

                                                                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException,

parameters - The map of parameters where the key identifies the parameter.
Returns:
A map of result values from the invokation.
Throws:
